note: Milk Tea Alliance general strike takes place all over the coutry

Myanmar police arrested more than 200 students and doctors(who were in strike of medicine universities) were made to take off their duty coats and got arrested. They also said 'If you do not obey what we said, we will have to shoot you and kill you.'. The duty coats were then dumped into trash cans.
All arrested students and doctors were released at a quaratine center near Mindhamma.
Both international and local group of companies issued a statement that they are deeply concerned about the current situation in Myanmar.
Due to terrorism act of police and Myanmar soldiers, more than 24 citizens are dead.
